item.title: Fit your paper into 12 pages
item.description: Fit your paper into 12 pages I collected these techniques from my advisor Mohammad, my labmate Prateesh, and stackoverflow. % The following option preserves the space between words and letters, % making it less likely to piss off your reviewers than the next option. %\usepackage[subtle, lists=tight, wordspacing=normal, tracking=normal]{savetrees} % The following option reduces the space between words and letters. Can save 0.5-1 column % from a 12-page paper, but makes the paper slightly less readable.

item.title: Hometown
item.description: Hometown I was born and raised in Hangzhou (杭州), Zhejiang, China.

item.title: Incomplete list of native Mac app developers
item.description: Incomplete list of native Mac app developers Desktop apps based on web technology (e.g., Electron, React Native) are ugly and inefficient. Here is a list of developers that produce truly-native Mac applications. Hog Bay Software iA CotEditor Project Sketch Panic Shiny Frog Mimestream

item.title: Languages
item.description: Languages Want to try Swift Chisel Haskell TLA+ / Spin

item.title: X11 Forwarding from macOS
item.description: X11 Forwarding from macOS What I want to install XQuartz on my Mac so that it has an X server, and then forward it to remote hosts that I SSH onto. Why So that I can run GUI applications on remote hosts without local X server (or window manager). GUI apps on remote hosts will connect to the forwarded X server on my Mac, and display whatever window directly on my Mac.
